website_summaries.verdict: Takes the fear out of bathing, thanks to state-of-the-art 3-way sprayer. Perfect for getting to hard-to-reach places, including underbelly.
pros: Variable flow lever helps conserve water, and you can use the sprayer to clean the area when the bath is over
Stores away easily and comes with Teflon tape for installation if needed
cons: Connector to shower could break after long-term use

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, took all about 7 minutes. Unscrew your current shower head, clean off the threads, apply the plumbers tape, screw on the attachment, add plumbers tape to original shower head, screw that into new attachment. Boom Done. To attached the hose, you push it into the attachment and twist and it locks in place. No leaks as of yet but will update if need be. Makes washing the dog much easier and then washing down the tub afterwards too.
customer_reviews.author: murps

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this product.. Look at the 1-2 star reviews -  Connector to shower head is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Read the low star reviews on this product. I did read them before but figured they may have had this problem fixed since it had so many good reviews. The connector to the shower broke after 2 sessions with the dog. It is a very cheap product. Save your money and go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: A bucket of water would have been easier.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. The nozzle head itself arrived with multiple cracks. I repaired the defects with JB weld as the price was too low to bother with an exchange. The hose is very stiff and hard to maneuver. The adapter is made out of a cheap plastic with painted on chrome. The adapter however was not cracked, but still hemorrhaged water even on pressures as low as a trickle. The nozzle's ring is very thin and made of the same smooth plastic so it is genuinely impossible to adjust once you've begun washing your soapy, greasy, dirty, wiggling dog.
customer_reviews.author: j_and_goddess

customer_reviews.title: Must have for anyone who bathes their own dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. We used to bathe our 70lb Labradoodle in the bath, but it was too uncomfortable due to the large size of our tub. Sometimes I would just get in there with him. LOL. This was a no brainer. I even picked up a diverter valve to attach to our existing shower head. this is it right here:  Hooked those together and it works great. Now I can bring him in the shower and no more hassles. I love the different settings as I can use the stronger flow on his paws and the gentle flow around his face. Life is good for this pup and his owner!
customer_reviews.author: MFowers

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect. But just barely.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Get it if you have dogs and a tub. We have 2 German shepherds. Before we were using cups and small buckets to dump water. Never worked! Now we use this and it's amazing the only 2 downsides are the on off switch on the nozzle itself is a little easy to bump and turn water flow off and when you remove the hose from it's quick detach spot the spring pressure may allow water to leak. No major concern just a drizzle. Again. You should probably still buy this if you like to keep dogs clean. Or humans
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: Had a pup for 2 years but got another and finally decided to invest in an easier bathtime. I'm cheap so I say invest but the price is actually not bad at all. It's made bathtime so much easier since I have a fixed shower head and was just filling the tub and using a small bucket. It's easier on me and makes baths a lot quicker so easier on the pups. Installation was super simple and they even include a roll of plumber's tape.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy T.

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful item to have; its is long enough to go completely under my Phantom's belly. Phantom is a corgi so he is only about 3 to 4 inches off the ground. There a lever type system on the nozzle that stops the flow of the water, allowing you to put it down while you either rub in more soap or adjust position. There are settings on the nozzle too that make it suitable for a dog with hair (thin) or with a double coat (very thick). The hose comes with an adapter so you can easy snap on the hose for a puppy bath and then unplug it and take a shower yourself. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: LittleTwoLegs

customer_reviews.title: Easy, inexpensive, and effective pet sprayer
customer_reviews.text: This is inexpensive and easy to install as long as you have an adjustable wrench- a quick trip to the hardware store to buy one and it was fully installed in 5 minutes! It is the right length to get my huge dog from nose to tail. I like that it clips on and off so it does not need to hang out in the shower when the humans are getting clean and I can just snap it on once a month for his baths. The nozzle control is a great feature to be able to "pause" the water and to use different types of spray for different areas.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline STop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Made dog washing so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Before I was having to wash my large dog in the bathtub with a container to dump the water on her. It was very messy, took a long time, and hard on the back. I hooked this sprayer up in our stand up shower and now washing her is quick, clean, and easy. It only took me a couple of minutes to install and I take it out each time I'm done washing her. It clips back in instantly and I can keep it rolled up and stored in the cupboard when not in use. I also like that I can control the spray pressure including stopping the water all through the hand held nozzle. I Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Rinse Away as a replacement for my current dog sprayer which was falling apart. This sprayer worked really well and the multi-function spray head worked really well. The unit connected quickly and easily to the shower arm while the hose is also very easy to connect. I can't say the dog was any happier but I was happy with the way things turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Shboom

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hopeless product. With a partner in construction, the basic water sealing mechanisms were entirely absent. Nearly ruined our entire bathroom, walls and ceilings and terrified poor hounds. To say it is poorly made is an understatement. Very cheap, never functioned without phenomenal leaking and spraying everywhere. Not worth your money BUT even moreso NOT worth the stress and headache that should come as a warning label attached to product! When dog bathing is already a trial for some dogs, this made house cleaning an addition concern. Faulty, cheap, ineffective and useless product that causes more damage than good let alone addresses the situation. BUY ANYTHING else@!!
customer_reviews.author: christina Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Makes bath time a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! This shower head is a lifesaver! Before, my bathroom would be soaked trying to control the dogs, pour the water etc etc, not to mention the pain in my back it caused. This shower attachment keeps the dogs calm, the long hose makes it easy to presoak the dogs thoroughly before the soap. The gentle pressure kept them calm, while the pulsating level made them feel as if they were getting a good back scratch which made them happy and relaxed. The pressure was perfect to get all soap off so it made bath time quick and so much easier! I highly reccomend this.
customer_reviews.author: anna campbell

customer_reviews.title: Low water flow and the connecting mechanism unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Water pressure is low so very difficult to wet and then rinse the soap out of my dog's coat. Also, the hose is easy to detach, but increasingly diffiult to reattach. Today, I couldn't get it to lock on at all. When I looked inside, I could see the plastic around the tip is dented so can't insert properly. Therefore, the sprayer is useless, and I had to throw the whole thing out. Probably used it less than a dozen times.
customer_reviews.author: AnnQ

customer_reviews.title: Great item - until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product conceptually, it allows you to control the flow of the water which is great for face washing of your pets. you can also turn off the water while you lather right from the nozzle. The hose part is great however the connector seems to break. I am on my third one because you cant just buy the part that connects it to the shower head. Three stars because again it is great as long as it works, i did get a year out of one, 2 months out of another, and just received my new replacement so the clock starts again.
customer_reviews.author: PocketMerlin

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after 1 year. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: We have a giant german shepherd that is difficult to bath to begin with, but this attachment not only gets the job done but it makes it EASY. The attachment that goes between the shower head and the wall is very sleek and you'll never notice it. It blends right in. If you're having any worries about it like I was don't fret, and BUY THIS. It will make your dog's bath 10000000000x easier. We also love that it has the feature to turn the wand on and off by the handle so that you don't waste water. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wash my two dogs in the winter. The easiest experience I have had washing them inside ever. Pressure could be a little stronger, but this worked out perfectly. Easy to install. I have 2 medium sized dogs- one a shepherd mix with longer hair & this was great for getting all the shampoo out of his coat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brower

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Hooking this up was so simple, it works excellent too. If you open it up fully, it really shoots water! I used it to clean my shower which is large. I also use it in the shower to give my German Shepherd a bath but I don’t put it on full power as that’s too much pressure. I like the quick disconnect system, makes it very easy to use. Hose is long enough to do many tasks.
customer_reviews.author: two jacks

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well. We’ve only used it once so far, so I can’t speak to it’s longevity, but I haven’t had any issues with the setup and use and am very pleased with. However, the installation instructions mention a connector for a sink faucet and says the connection is included, which it was not. I actually would have preferred the connection for my sink vs the shower. And the shower connector does not work with my large waterpik rain shower head, so each time I use this I will have to remove and reinstall my shower head, which is why the sink connection would have been preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Materfamilias

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy install
customer_reviews.text: Installed the adapter in the shower..... Connected the end and gave it a run! WORKED great. Really liked the three settings for the spray, also the ability to adjust the flow. Cons: - This could just be my shower .... The water would get HOT while the head was in the off position for a period of time. (5 min soak, going to get another Dawg) Not really a CON more of an suggestion : Wish it had a bit more grip on the handle, when you get your suds lathered up and you reach for it kinda slippery when wet! All in all very nice setup, we will see how well it hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This product works good, a little water does spray from the joint before the spray head. Also, the part that connects to the shower is plastic. I don't anticipate that it will last long if you take it on and off often. Only time will tell. Three stars because of the plastic part that I don't think will last and as far as I know you can't just purchase that part as a replacement part. As for the vendor, at this point they would get 5 stars, no issues with shipping was speedy delivery. If it doesn't last and I have to return it and the vendor gives me issues I will change the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, but poor quality. Only lasted 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I could rate this higher, but the quality is garbage. Very handy shower wand for the dog that I greatly enjoyed using for the first 2 months. We give our dog a shower about 2-3 times per week. After 2 months, the adapter that goes into the existing shower head shoots out water every time it's disconnected. It would take about 5-10 mins of finnicking with it to get it to work normally. Now 4 months later, the final straw. The wand itself doesn't turn fully on or fully off. No idea why.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately mine arrived with a small crack in the handle near where it connects to the hose. So it sprays everywhere including all over me. I threw the package away before I checked it out so that was my fault. I threw it away. I was not a fan of the sprayer attachment to the shower head either. There is no diverter so you have to disconnect it to use your shower head. Not a good design. I've bought several of these sprayers in the past and this was the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Keough

customer_reviews.title: Easy initial install, easy to turn on/off at the handle
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation, although you need to disconnect the hose each time you are done. When you connect the hose to the valve, it shuts off the flow to the shower head. Not a big deal, but it would be nice to not have to install / remove the hose each time. Putting the hose onto the valve does take a bit as it does not line up very easy, especially if your shower head is higher. It does have 3 variable water flow streams, and the on / off is nice to have with single hand operation. 8' hose is perfect. Overall - satisfied with the sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: RUNTY 1

customer_reviews.title: Thought this was amazing but nope!
customer_reviews.text: **Update** Ive had this for a little over a month now and the blue piece on the handle broke off and now this item that I thought was amazing is now another piece of junk that broke after a month of use. I’m so disappointed and upset. It literally broke the day after the return window closed. That’s pretty convenient, huh?? This shower head attachment has made my life so much easier. My Golden Retriever loves having a weekly bath and his fur is so thick that using a cup to rinse him was very difficult. This is so much easier and more efficient. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I washed my friends dog, and they had this. Took the time to find the same one. Very happy with how it works. When plugged in, it turns off the shower head. Three modes on the head, and a simple flow control on the handle. Definately recommend. Wish they had a higher quality version though. As in metal parts instead of plastic. Of course at this price point that isn't going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck and dog!
customer_reviews.text: This an excellent product! I love the 3 different settings to determine how water comes out (much like our shower head) and then then the lever controls the intensity. Nemo is 9 years old and before buying this, his baths were a nightmare for us both. But, Now that I use this for his baths, he seems to be much more cooperative and I can get those hard to reach areas and under his neck better. His fur also feels much cleaner and softer for longer opposed to when I used the old school rinse with a cup method. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mickens

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I thought it looked a little cheaply made when I opened it. But it does the job. My Pitty mix hates her bath, but the ability to turn this on in off with one finger was a great help! Left my other hand free to hold on to Miss Elly. I also like the way I can adjust the water flow, that help cut down on the panic in my dog. Don't know if it will hold up real well, but for the price it did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Kay E

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST THING EVER! Seriously idk why I waited until my dog turned TEN to get one of these. Oh yea, it’s because I could never find one that was good quality, had a hose longer than 4 feet (because really what’s the point?), and cost under $50. Until now! This shower hose is amazing. This month I’ve already given my dog 2 baths and haven’t broken a sweat! Not gonna lie, it works great on humans too. I feel like I’m at the salon every time. In short - works great, easy to install, easy to use, affordable, and good quality. Why haven’t you ordered one yet?!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: We recently adopted an 8th month old 30 pound puppy who isn't a fan of the bath. The pet sprayer was easy for my husband to install and it cut the bath time down considerably. I wasn't sure if the hose would be long enough with our goose neck shower heads but it is plenty long. I found that our puppy enjoyed it when I held the sprayer against her skin and used it as a massager of sorts. Still not a huge fan of the bath but this made it a better experience for both of us. I'm considering using it for myself when I just want to wash my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marathon_gal

customer_reviews.title: sufficient but not great
customer_reviews.text: What I especially didn't like about this is the diverter and the way the hose connects to the converter. The diverter is plastic and the hose is really difficult to connect to it. It would be far better if it screwed on. Other than that it works just fine. Not an especially strong flow but sufficient. I have since bought another more expensive brand that is far less of a struggle for me.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Works very well just what I required
customer_reviews.text: Came with all required parts including Teflon tape. The quick disconnect works very well. The valve on the head is able to shut the water off completely. The quick disconnect that you install on the shower head works well and does not leak with or without the attachment. I would rate it higher but it is not the highest quality but it does work fine and have had no problems. Don't take that as being poor quality just not high quality. I recommend this item for this price range. If you are looking for something to install in your $50,000 bathroom this is probably not it.
customer_reviews.author: dmreyno

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a rapid-o shower product that was for outside use... but needed an indoor shower head for our dog for Winter baths. This turned out to be a wonderful product. Not only is it easy to install, it also has a release for the shower hose so you can remove it when not in use. The sprayer is easy to use and has three settings. If you want to give your dog or cats a bath in the shower, i recommend this product. The hose is 8', giving plenty of reach in the bath tub.
customer_reviews.author: Hologram

customer_reviews.title: Perfect easy to install time saver.
customer_reviews.text: Wish we would have bought this years ago!!! made giving our dog a bath 100 X easier!!! It was super simple to install.......it literally took 2 minutes. You simply screw off your shower head, put pipe tape (supplied) on the threads of your shower pipe, screw in the new coupler (included), screw back in your shower head and voila.......thats it. It doesn't leak either!! then when you want to use the sprayer it has a quick attach to the coupler, then you just turn the water on and use the sprayer to control how the water stream comes out. Couldn't be any easier.
customer_reviews.author: joe kessinger

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and installed it. At the base it is poorly made. It shoots water in all directions in the part from the hose to the head. I think i will return it due to this. It was easy to install and i do like the design of the off switch but i do not enjoy getting sprayed in the face when i use it. I read some other reviews and it looks like other have this issue too.
customer_reviews.author: adam jensen

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing I don’t like about this water sprayer. The quality seems good enough. The pressure/shut off valve works perfectly. The length is sufficient. I definitely recommend to anyone that bathes their pets in the bath tub.
customer_reviews.author: Niki H

customer_reviews.title: So Much Better Than A Cup!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this pet shower sprayer! I was previously using a cup which made my fur baby’s bath time tedious and drawn out. I used this sprayer tonight and it saturated my pet’s fur with water almost instantly with impressive water pressure. Shampoo lather was quick and the rinse seemed very comprehensive, allowing for a complete (and clean) rinse of both shampoo and conditioner. I highly recommend this sprayer for pet owners looking for a home solution for pet baths.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for a product like this to make washing out dog easier and less stressful for all parties involved. After a little bit of research, we stumbled across this product! We ordered 1 day shipping and my husband was super excited to install it and try it out! There was a pinhole leak where the head attaches to the cord but he was able to fix that fairly easily. After the bath my husband exclaimed "I can't imaging having a dog and not having this now that I've tried it!" High praise indeed. Less hassle, less mess, and our dog handled it better not being forced to move around in the tub!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily L

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for home dog baths in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Not the most aesthetically pleasing option however it is so extremely practical. Installation was simple, they provided the plumbers tape which was a nice touch as well. Easy to remove and not heavy which allows ease of use when utilizing the sprayer. Gentle but also provides enough pressure to wash off grime and dirt. The remove-able option is a great feature as well so that it can be removed when others want to take a shower.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Way better then using cups of water on my dogs head.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a couple times but it has saved me from getting into the shower when giving my big dogs baths. I have a small master bathroom and we redid our tub with glass shower doors so only 1 half of the tub is accessible from the outside, making it hard to rinse a dog that is trying to avoid the water from the shower head. Now I just attach this and when they try to move to the other side I can still rinse them, although the don’t hide as much because I have more control of the water without having to dump cups of water on their head.
customer_reviews.author: BacardiprincessTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works has intended.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. I did not receive the suction cup that holds it in place when not in use so I cannot comment on that feature. I wasn't going to use it so I didn't care much. Easy to attach and detach when bathing my dog. Life saver in a house with no tubs.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: The item I received works great - I followed the advice of other reviewers & ...
customer_reviews.text: The item I received works great - I followed the advice of other reviewers & have had no issues after half a dozen uses (about 1 hour's worth of usage each time). I have 4 (medium & small) dogs that I wash in the tub. Hose is JUST long enough to make the job easier. Nozzle is easy to use, but a little awkward to hold. I guess it depends on your own water pressure, but I get just average water pressure when using this - it could be better, but still does the job. Hose is easy on & off (allow hose to drain before removing).
customer_reviews.author: S V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install/Use
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer is easy to install and use. I have mechanical disabilities affecting mobility and hand coordination. I have little problem holding and operating this product with it's simple, well placed controls. My large service dog for mobility assistance ~loves~ it. He holds perfectly still and closes his eyes when the spray hits just the right spot. We are both pleased with the first use. Time will tell if it's durable enough for my fumbly handling. ~Lady and G
customer_reviews.author: Lady Doghaven

customer_reviews.title: Love it, have multiple, always give as gifts too!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog washer hose. Works great, easy install. I have bought probably about 5 of these so far. 2 for my house and then a few more as a gift for various friends/family with dogs. Everyone is very happy with it. Havent had any issues with it over the last 5 or so years.
customer_reviews.author: @mazon is why I'm broke!

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for at home dog bathing!
customer_reviews.text: If you wash your dog inside this is a MUST have. I was just going to get a normal shower head wand attachment but I'm so glad I went for this. Installation is super easy and it's nice to have 3 different settings that can be turned on and off while you are shampooing etc. A setting to just get your dog wet, then a more aggressive one to get off all the shampoo and a final rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as our water heater went out, and we needed a sprayer with a hose of at least 8ft. so that we weren't breaking our backs 'leaning' over/in the tub to bathe. Very good quality plastic. The nozzle is super easy to handle and operate, and the flex hose easily wraps around the shower nozzle, out of the way. We couldn't be happier with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Leanette T.

customer_reviews.title: A few drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: This little sprayer works so well to spray off cloth diapers! I wish there was a holder included with it and the joint piece for the shower splitter is plastic. Another drawback is that in order to use your regular shower you have to completely unhook the sprayer. I wish you could just switch between the two. Otherwise it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard and Chantel McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: My pups that they went to the spa
customer_reviews.text: Great to bath your pets in the tub., easy to use and good quality. I am happy that I purchased and my pups were too! My pups thought they were getting a massage. The only thing missing is a way to hang the hand nozzle on the shower wall when not in use, I wish they would of provided a suction wall hanger. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I do this year's ago!?! For years I have struggled with the cup and tub method, never feeling like I ever got my dog clean, let alone rinsed. I just gave my 14 year old Shih Tzu a bath and it was almost a pleasure! So quick and easy! My husband installed it in about 30 seconds. I love the 3 pressure/flow settings. Can't wait to try it on my lab, who is impossible to get her coat saturated with water. I think this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Mendy Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets and babies.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement to the older version which was flawed and broke after 6 years of light use. The reason I decided to purchase the same brand but new version is because they clearly fixed the problem area the old version had. There are 3 spray patterns on the nozzle and a lever that will control the intensity. (This is where the improvements were made) I use the sprayer for washing our dogs and it works very well for infants that can’t sit in a tub yet. On the right setting it is very gentile on the baby and he loves it. It sure does beat the cup we were using to rinse him.
customer_reviews.author: Elbow_Grease

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this to bath my Newfoundland and my little mix breed dog in my shower. It has a long hose which is great. If you have high water pressure make sure the hose is in right and the whole way. I used this until my Newfoundland outgrew my walk in shower. I still use it for my little dog. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog bath hose
customer_reviews.text: We were giving our pup a bath in the shower much to our sore back's dismay. This hose makes it possible to sit on the side of the tub without killing your back. It's very easy to change settings and easy to turn off when working in the soap and back on for the rinse. Very glad we purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Norsky

customer_reviews.title: These hoses are a must have for dog baths!
customer_reviews.text: These things will save you time & back ache. Just make sure you take the connector with you when you move out of your apartment! [face palm].... BUT you can buy them here on Amazon for $5; the manufacturer will charge you $10 :( , fyi.
customer_reviews.author: shilbert

customer_reviews.title: Handy! Easy to use. Just one warning...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was not TOTALLY easy, suffice it to say don’t assume your oldest plumbing fixtures are the ones to try it on, but once they’re repaired after you break them trying...voila, new shower head AND handy dog washing hose (that works quite well on human bathers, too, and why wouldn’t it?). I have two Rough Collies, and they get MUDDY out on our farm. This attachment makes it super easy to hop them in the tub and quickly rinse off their legs and tummies at the end of the day. I would give it six stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Showjumper

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Shower connector is plastic. So if you put it on with the tape to make sure it doesn’t leak, good luck getting it off without breaking it. Also, if you want a replacement that’s metal you’ll have to spend $20 on their website for it. Might as well buy a normal handle for the shower at that point.
customer_reviews.author: deadhead

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE for big dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Do you own a monster sized dog? Small couch alligator? Maybe even a house horse? BUY THIS IMMEDIATELY. It was super easy to install, and it works wonders to make bath time for our dogs much quicker. No more dumping dirty water on them to rinse! Probably cut bath time in half! It also causes us to use less water than if filling the tub, so a money saver there. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Khalie E. Frisch

customer_reviews.title: Not just for pets
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for giving my daughter a shower, and for rinsing our cloth diapers. Definitely don’t use it for an animal, but it works well for what we use it for. I like that it has an on/off switch, power adjustment, and multiple shower settings just like a normal shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite strong enough but gets the job done well
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am enjoying this product. It was very easy to install with no prior bathroom plumbing experience. The connection from the shower head to the hose seems very solid and hasn't leaked a bit. I wish that it was a bit more powerful on full blast, but it gets the job done. This has helped bath time a lot for my dog (who hates bath time).
customer_reviews.author: MallardTop

customer_reviews.title: Simple and practical
customer_reviews.text: I love this showerhead. It's lightweight and allows you to control the strength of the water flow. It's easy to control while bathing your dog. I'm using it for myself as well. The head is compact and so simple. It's functionality makes everything so much easier if you have dogs, or if you need to sit down in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Had Over A Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April 2017 and it still works perfect! I used this on my german shepherd who hated bathes. I have a 4 year old little girl who's nicknames is pig pen becuase of how dirty she gets so this has been a life saver so many times. I have been so happy with my purchase and if something ever does go wrong with it I will be buying this exact one again. Easy to install and use I couldn't ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Js

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for at home dog baths
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my most favorite purchase on Amazon ever! Easy installation and now it makes giving my massive dog a bath soooooo much easier. I like how there are different spray options and a valve that turns the water on/off. Now I don’t feel like I’m wasting water.
customer_reviews.author: NinnieUGA

customer_reviews.title: Does the sprayer work great to wash pets
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning this if I can't find a fix for my problem. Does the sprayer work great to wash pets? Absolutely! My problem is that after I removed the attachment, which should have switched the water back over to the normal sprayer, water came out of both the hole where the attachment goes and the main sprayer. We currently have a plastic bag tied around that portion of the three-way attachment so that we can take showers while I scour the interwebs to find a satisfactory result.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we needed to bathe our gsd (90lb) puppy. Easy to install but you will need a pair of channel locks. Comes with plumbers tape (thumbs up) - use it, trust me on that one. Hose connects/disconnects very easily. Hose is long enough to work effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to give my dog a bath at home in the tub. I was able to remove shower head, screw on the connection and replace the shower head. It does not affect my water pressure in the shower. When I want to give my dog a bath, I just connect the hose to the connection by my shower head. I can give her a bath and then clean the tub afterwards, remove hose and put away. It works wonderful and saves me money from paying to go get her a bath at a groomer.
customer_reviews.author: Terri T.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this for our Labrador. It's quick to hook up to our showerhead and give her a bath. She seems more calm using this sprayer than when the water is just running from the tub faucet because that can get rather loud, this sprayer makes it nice and quite and I love being able to turn it n and off right at the sprayer head.
customer_reviews.author: scott a thor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for bathing my dog. I have it attached to the shower head in the guest bathroom and I just keep it there. When it's time to bathe Quincy it is all setup and ready to do. I do have to state that I live alone no one regularly uses the guest shower. Definitely makes it easy to give him a bath!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina C.

customer_reviews.title: Makes life way easier
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best purchase I have ever made! We used to use a pitcher to rinse our dog off during baths and it was getting tiresome and tedious. But this has really made everything easier and faster! The installation was easy (though my husband used different teflon tape than the one provided because it apparently was crap). The piece main attachment piece is plastic so it does seem little bit unsturdy and easily breakable, but we have had for 2 months and had no issue with leaks so far. Overall I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Keeley Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Not a very strong sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with this sprayer I have bought other sprayers from the same manufacturer and had no issues. This sprayer has 3 adjustments, & a 6 ft hose, I have great water pressure & know it's not the water pressure. Even the Jet like spray isn't as strong as I expected. I never returned it and should had, I am looking for another pet sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Powell

customer_reviews.title: Was the greatest for a very short time!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I have bought two and won’t buy a second one! I cannot get this attached no matter how I turn it. My dog has sensitive skin so he is only bathed every 3-4 weeks. Very irritating how many washings I’ve used it! wish I had seen this years ago! This saves my back and is also easier on my smaller dog as he hates water. Easy to use and just stows away under the sink . Also doesn’t affect the shower water flow at all which is what I was wondering about!
customer_reviews.author: suzyq

customer_reviews.title: Great product; missing star due to plastic valve
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this product. It makes washing our lab a whole lot easier! Before, we would fill the tub up a bit and use a cup to rinse him but we could never get him 100% rinsed. This makes it a breeze! My only gripe is that the included diverter is made of plastic and is chrome which does not match the rest of our bathroom hardware. Be careful when screwing on the included valve and your shower head so you do not break the valve! As a bonus, teflon tape is included so all you need for installation is a wrench!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a good purchase! It's such a pain trying to give my dog a bath using a cup. This was so easy to install and use. It has great pressure and a long reach so I can even wash my dog when he's trying to hide in the back corner of the bath. I don't know why I waited so long to get this. It's a game changer and such a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Length of hose is great.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this sprayer. I like that you can control the flow and even cut it off temporarily. The length is perfect, many I have had in the past are too short to reach the underside of my dog, or reach the back of the shower, where she likes to try to get away from the water. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because you have to take the hose off to use the regular shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Hokie97Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Rinse Ace 3 Way Pet Shower Sprayer with 8 foot
customer_reviews.text: The plastic handle has hairline crack. I have not used but a few times. I noticed it was spraying water from somewhere else about 3 weeks. Can you do some thing about this. Could not find the web addy I tryed calling these people & they don't. They just hang up. If i was you I would not buy this item. Piece a junk
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two different purposes...to rinse hair dye out of my hair and to bathe my long hair dogs. This was extremely easy for my not so handy husband to install. It is easy to remove the hose when not in use. It worked great! It definitely made bathing my dogs so much easier!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love! So easy to use and install. I was very skeptical to be totally honest and I’m completely blown away! I really like the on/off feature for the water so you’re not wasting it after shampooing and when you’re putting on the conditioner. Water pressure is great trying to rinse off all the soap.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sellars

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, I had it on and was washing my dog within 5 minutes. Just follow the directions. The hose is a great length - not too long but I can reach every part of him to make sure he's completely rinsed off. I like the different pressure sprays. Easy to take on and off. I recommend and would buy it again! I also love the fact that it comes with plumbing tape and a good amount of it to make sure the connections don't leak!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenixgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. The inline shower head connection is easy to use and so discreet I don’t mind leaving it attached all the time
customer_reviews.author: High expectations

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprayer for washing my dogs at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first sprayer ten years ago. Recently the nozzle started to leak, so I figured why not buy it again. It is a bargain and it lasts. I have a Frenchie who needs two baths a week in the Spring and Summe because of her allergies. I also bathe my English Bulldog once a week all year round. This sprayer makes it easy to wash my Bullies in my bath tub. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stefanowicz

customer_reviews.title: Bath time so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this item!!! Works perfectly. I was using just my norma shower head to wash my pups in, but the cord was not long enough which made everything difficult. This item has helped tremendously on that! Washed the dogs last night with no hassle. Love how you can shut the hose off with your thumb and change the water sprayer settings. ALSO, so simple to install. ALSO, easy to put the attachment hose on and take off. If you wash your dogs often in the tub, get this.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Truth

customer_reviews.title: The best at home dog bath ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! I have back pain which can make a lot of stuff hard for me to do, bending over the bathtub with a cup trying to rinse my dog was one of the hardest things ever! Not anymore! 8 ft hose makes it to where I’m able to even rinse her tummy with out a fight!
customer_reviews.author: C. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Not great for low water pressure.
customer_reviews.text: The water pressure in this thing sucks, it takes twice as long to rinse my short haired dogs. And it's kind of cheap plastic, doesn't look like it'll hold up for long. I ended up buying a stainless steel handheld multi-function high pressure showerhead with an off switch for the same price, it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver in cutting bath time for both my Siberian Husky, Golden, maltipoo, and the cat! It takes forever to fully soak my two bigger dogs and the cat, but this does the job wonderfully!!!
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a cup!
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight leak in my shower head now that I've installed this diverter and no matter what I do I cannot fix it - just part of the cheap design I suppose. But I can't complain too much without doing something drastic like installing an intricate new shower head with sprayer attachment so I guess this will do. It has a nice feature of being able to manage the spray flow at the handle and it is truly much better than the cup I was dumping over my dog's head before....
customer_reviews.author: Meta Fouric

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought this hose for one small dog, so we could give her a bath at home. She loves it but it’s turned out to also work to bath our infant son and even ourselves! With its many pressure options, it’s worked out beyond what we expected!
customer_reviews.author: Missy V

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure. Also like how the hoses doesn't have to stay connected and hanging from the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: sher n

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this thing for the first month I used it. So convenient. Then after a month or two the damn handle started leaking. I used it MAYBE five or six times. But it was just a leak so I didn’t care that much. THEN the adaptor that mounts behind the shower head broke. I have to turn the water on and off a few times because the valve won’t bypass the nozzle and go back to spraying from the shower head. Like I said, this is a great product, but it’s made VERY poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Gooding

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak and love the ease of it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leak and love the ease of it. The only thing I wish was that there was a way to drain the water out of it that I'm sure just sits in there and...mildews? Works very well though.
customer_reviews.author: Brownbie

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: We've used it four times so far and really no complaints. Easy to attach, no leaks, all of the spray patterns work.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: I recently purchased this. It was not evident that ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this. It was not evident that to use the existing shower head you must detach the hose from the connector. Other models I looked at had a valve that allowed you to switch between the existing shower head and the pet shower sprayer, with no need to disconnect the hose. Had I known the hose had to be removed on this model To use the existing shower head I would have purchased a different model. Also, the installation instructions reference an enclosed Suction Mount Bracket to store the sprayer on, yet no such bracket was included.
customer_reviews.author: RSO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dog baths in guest bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: We bathe our dog in our guest bathroom tub. The attachment makes it’s really easy to convert back into shower mode when we have guests. Our biggest concern was making sure the tubing was long enough to reach our dog in the tub and it’s perfect length! Super pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use but when you flip the ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use but when you flip the switch off and then on again the water changes tempurature. Too hot, too cold! Driving me nuts and makes giving a bath a little harder for a dog that won't stay still. I have to constantly adjust the water using the main knob, don't want to burn my pup or freeze him. I guess if you just keep the water running the temp would stay constant. Overall it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOTS of leaking.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used version of this product, so I may have just gotten a bum sprayer. However, the shower head attachment leaked the first time I used it, which was annoying but not the end of the world. But the sencond time I used it water cane shooting out of the wand handle and I had to plug it with my thumb the entire time I bathed my dog. Needless to say I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Hassevoort

customer_reviews.title: I love this more than my dog...
customer_reviews.text: My puppy Kayla hates baths, showers in the tub are slightly easier as she's less likely to bolt. This device allows me to turn the water on/off as needed without having to get up and actually adjust the water. There are also different ranges, so you can have a better or lesser flow. Buying a nice shower head set seemed crazy, and this works better for her than what we would have purchased for our guest bathroom anyway. It's not perfect, but its 9/10 stars, when the water is switched off on the device the shower head up top will still drip
customer_reviews.author: Troublemaakerz

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sprayer that I love
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a sprayer for my dog that I like and actually works. Very easy to install ! You can even scan the barcode on the pack of the package and it gives you very easy instructions! Easy on my dog and she liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Shell-Ports VA

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Loooooooooooooooove this! Not only is it easier to bathe our dogs but it helps when cleaning the shower walls too! I don't really use the different water "pulses" as our dogs don't care for it. Putting it together was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: washing pup needs high water pressure to rinse quickly. ...
customer_reviews.text: washing pup needs high water pressure to rinse quickly.....water pressure was way to low...i ordered a smaller 3"high water pressure shower head with an on off switch at walmart...rinses in minutes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shower head! I have two dogs and live in a high rise apartment where doggy baths can be a challenge. I had this set up and gave my dog a bath in a grand total of 15 minutes. I also plan to use this to clean and spray down my whole shower since it has better reach than just my normal shower head!
customer_reviews.author: Barkley

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this product and the sprayer hose end didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and the sprayer hose end didn't work with the shower head part. so asked to return it and ordered a second one. The second one was the same as the first one, the hose doesn't connect with the shower head part. I will not purchase it again from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hose attachment
customer_reviews.text: With shelter in place I had to find a solution to bathe my dog. This is percent and he loves his baths - easy to attach to my existing shower head and I click it in place to use the hose. For the price - I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to couple and uncouple the hose from the shower arm base, the hose is extra long, the shut off value is easy to operate with one hand if necessary. Ive only used a few times so i cannot attest to the durabilty, but with a little tlc during the coupling process I think I can get my money's worth from this.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W, Staten Island

customer_reviews.title: The extra long hose really helps
customer_reviews.text: The 8’ vs our older 6’ hose really makes dog washing much easier. And the adjustable spray allows us to lighten the spray for the dogs face rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Boatwaco

product_meta.title: Rinse Ace 3 Way Pet Shower Sprayer with 8 Foot Hose and Quick Connect to Showerhead
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionThe Rinse Ace 3-Way Pet Shower lets pets enjoy warm showers indoors, anytime. The improved sprayer has three settings for Gentle, Pulsating and Concentrated sprays. Variable flow lever saves water. Includes quick connect for showerhead. This product fits on a standard shower fitting and the hose is 8ft long. Standard shower arms (the pipe that comes out of the wall) have a 1/2" male pipe thread.
feature_bullets: State-of-the-art, three-setting sprayer makes the shower easier and more enjoyable
Gentle Full spray is ideal for rinsing the hard-to-reach underbelly
Concentrated spray is perfect for targeted rinsing of delicate areas
Variable Flow Lever toggles from Pause to Light to Full Flow, saving water and preventing accidental sprays

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,404 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
